title: Game won't launch after windows insider update
body:
Yesterday, I've updated my windows version, to the latest insider version build 14352.
Today, I can't launch League of Legends anymore.

The launcher is opening, I can press launch, but after that the game won't start.

Any suggestions?

replies.body: I think I found a workaround, atleast for me. Killing the process "Desktop Window Manager" (have to do it maybe three times in order for it to work) makes the client pop up after pressing "Launch". I submitted a ticket to them, expectedly they said that they didn't support the preview version.
Same issue here, even tried reinstalling the game, but nothing happens after pressing "Launch".

It is possible that after Windows updated itself, there was a corruption with the patcher itself that is causing it to not launch itself correctly anymore.  Given this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434).  It has some of the most common solutions when the patcher seems to not launch the Login Screen properly.

Reply back and hit me up if you are still experiencing issues!
